person.persName: Thomas S. Porter (Grant County, Kentucky, schoolteacher and postmaster.)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, schoolteacher and postmaster. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Merrill Porter. School teacher in Boone County, Kentucky, in 1850. Common school teacher in Grant County in 1860. Household owned one enslaved person in Grant County in 1860. School teacher in Grant County in 1863. Postmaster for Williamstown in Grant County from October 20, 1864, to August 5, 1885.
